data.lyric:
[ti:Without You]
[ar:Luke Combs/Amanda Shires]
[al:Without You]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Without You - Luke Combs/Amanda Shires
[00:02.73]Lyrics by：Luke Combs/Wyatt Durrette/Dan Isbell
[00:05.46]Composed by：Luke Combs/Wyatt Durrette/Dan Isbell
[00:08.20]Dad sold every record he ever owned
[00:12.16]Floyd and Zeppelin Beatles Stones
[00:15.41]A lifetime of music gone just to get me through
[00:21.90]Momma always had her a second job
[00:25.45]Gone with the sun until six o'clock
[00:28.96]Whatever it took to get by she was gonna do
[00:35.43]Didn't dawn on me back then but now I see
[00:42.71]Without them I wouldn't be me
[00:48.48]When I'm up here on this stage
[00:52.54]The spotlight's on my face
[00:54.86]But I see you
[00:58.67]Sure it's me behind this mic stand
[01:02.40]And it's me strumming this Gibson
[01:05.92]It's me they love to give the credit to
[01:12.64]But me don't mean a thing without you
[01:22.45]You make sacrifices every night and day
[01:26.47]Never hear the crowd scream your name
[01:29.42]But there's a smile and a hand
[01:31.33]To hold when the show is through
[01:36.22]I'd give it all up just to keep your love
[01:39.86]But you wouldn't let me because you care too much
[01:43.09]About watching me watch my dreams all come true
[01:49.62]When I'm up here on this stage
[01:53.38]The spotlight's on my face
[01:55.93]But I see you
[01:59.51]Sure it's me behind this mic stand
[02:03.34]It's me strumming this Gibson
[02:06.78]It's me they love to give the credit to
[02:13.64]But me don't mean a thing without you
[02:23.39]You worked overtime to buy those tickets
[02:27.17]The gas the beer and the babysitters
[02:30.15]Just to spend one night with your baby at a country show
[02:37.09]Paid twenty d**n dollars for a place to park
[02:40.77]Got in line early to grab your spot
[02:43.69]So you deserve every word
[02:45.51]Every line of your favorite tune
[02:50.24]When I'm up here on this stage
[02:54.17]The spotlight's on my face
[02:56.59]But I see you
[03:00.39]Sure it's me behind this mic stand
[03:04.19]It's me strumming this Gibson
[03:07.67]And it's me they love to give the credit to
[03:14.07]I'm just trying to give
[03:16.00]The credit where credit's due
[03:21.29]Because me don't mean a thing without you
data.trans:
[ti:Without You]
[ar:Luke Combs/Amanda Shires]
[al:Without You]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:02.73]//
[00:05.46]//
[00:08.20]父亲变卖了他所有的唱片
[00:12.16]//
[00:15.41]变卖此生积累的唱片 只为让我渡过难关
[00:21.90]母亲总是做着两份工作
[00:25.45]日出而作
[00:28.96]让我渡过难关 她将不惜一切代价
[00:35.43]以前我没有意识到 但现在我明白
[00:42.71]没有他们 就没有今天的我
[00:48.48]当我站在舞台上
[00:52.54]当灯光无比闪耀
[00:54.86]我眼里只有你们
[00:58.67]虽然我拿着麦克风
[01:02.40]虽然我弹奏着吉他
[01:05.92]观众喜欢为我喝彩鼓掌
[01:12.64]但是没有你们 我便一无所有
[01:22.45]你们不辞辛劳 日复一日
[01:26.47]却没有人为你们喝彩鼓掌
[01:29.42]但每当我表演结束后
[01:31.33]总能看见你们的微笑 你们的支持
[01:36.22]我愿放弃所有 只为珍存这一份爱
[01:39.86]但你们决不允许 因为你们是如此在乎我
[01:43.09]见证着我的梦想逐一实现
[01:49.62]当我站在舞台上
[01:53.38]当灯光无比闪耀
[01:55.93]我眼里只有你们
[01:59.51]虽然我拿着麦克风
[02:03.34]虽然我弹奏着吉他
[02:06.78]观众喜欢为我喝彩鼓掌
[02:13.64]但是没有你们 我便一无所有
[02:23.39]为了一张门票 你们夜以继日工作
[02:27.17]做过无数工作
[02:30.15]只是渴望与你们的宝贝在乡村音乐表演秀上度过一晚
[02:37.09]为了找停车位 花了二十美元
[02:40.77]你们赶早排队 坐在观众席上
[02:43.69]此曲献给你们 我的父母
[02:45.51]我的爱 倾注在每字每句
[02:50.24]当我站在舞台上
[02:54.17]当灯光无比闪耀
[02:56.59]我眼里只有你们
[03:00.39]虽然我拿着麦克风
[03:04.19]虽然我弹奏着吉他
[03:07.67]观众喜欢为我喝彩鼓掌
[03:14.07]我只是想
[03:16.00]将我取得的成就归功于我伟大的父母
[03:21.29]没有你们 我便一无所有
